name: Joybound People & Pets - Free Vaccination Clinics
description: Free pet vaccination clinics at locations across Contra Costa County
fullDescription: Joybound holds free vaccination clinics throughout Contra Costa County to help ensure all pets have access to essential preventive care.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free rabies vaccinations
- Free DHPP/FVRCP vaccines
- Microchipping at low or no cost
- No appointment needed at clinics
- Multiple clinic locations across the county
howToGetIt:
1. Check the Joybound website for upcoming clinic dates and locations
2. Bring your pet to the clinic during scheduled hours
3. No appointment or proof of income required
4. Wait in line for service (first come, first served)
